game_description: Discord :D - https://discord.gg/YHKCQP6REp Experience powering up the only way anime characters know how.. by yelling! Go from an episode 1 anime character to the OP ones we all know and love!
review_1: I love anime, and this game is not working for some reason, and it says little memory.
review_2: Every time I try to open the game it sends me back to the oculus home and I’m not able to play
review_3: this is good but has alot of problems but i dont mind it is in early beta afterall so the problems are the voice meter every time i say goku very quietly i get kicked as if saying goku is bad and all i do is be SSJ aka super saiyan please add more forms and add powers like Kamehameha and especially UI and MUI please remove voice meter by the way add multiplayer and combat and movement also please make it so that there is a setting to turn on right hand movement since my left one has terrible stick drift well its easy to fix my stick drift but it sometimes comes back in 10 minutes or so and each form you get you get new powers example if you become SSJ or super saiyan you get “you idiot!” or “You fool!” aka angry kamehameha and if your base you can do Genki Dama or spirit bomb you can do both the mini one or the big one it matters on how much energy you gain and thats all Bye! have a great time and please do the stuff i said because it would make the game ALOT and i mean ALOT better also one thing add arms and character selection like jiren frieza raditz vegeta and stuff like that, Have a Amazing time :)
review_4: y’all need to wake up because it can’t be fun or emersive if i have to wispier yell take the meter of add movement y’all can be the best game if you put in effort but the game is fun and flying ❤️
review_5: I can’t even join the game it’s just black and I had to delete all my games just to get on it
